abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33762708, pmid33745209, pmid33755374, pmid33755375, pmid33735598, pmid33595641, pmid33729905, pmid33735503, pmid33756051, pmid33755376, pmid33746151
